sections.title: Fighter (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Fighter class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Fighter)
sections.description: Grants proficiency with all simple and martial weapons, all armor types (light, medium, heavy), and all shields including tower shields.

sections.title: Bonus Feats (Fighter)
sections.description: Grants bonus combat feats at 1st level and every even level thereafter, with the ability to retrain bonus feats every four levels starting at 4th level.

sections.title: Bravery (Ex) (Fighter)
sections.description: Provides a scaling bonus on Will saves against fear effects, starting at +1 at 2nd level and increasing by +1 every four levels.

sections.title: Armor Training (Ex) (Fighter)
sections.description: Reduces armor check penalty and increases maximum Dex bonus while wearing armor, plus allows normal movement in medium and heavy armor. Can be replaced with advanced armor training options.

sections.title: Weapon Training (Ex) (Fighter)
sections.description: Grants scaling attack and damage bonuses with selected weapon groups, applies to combat maneuvers, and can be replaced with advanced weapon training options.

sections.title: Armor Mastery (Ex) (Fighter)
sections.description: Grants damage reduction 5/— when wearing armor or using a shield at 19th level.

sections.title: Weapon Mastery (Ex) (Fighter)
sections.description: At 20th level, automatically confirms critical threats and increases critical multiplier by 1 for one chosen weapon type, plus prevents disarming with that weapon.

sections.title: Veteran of Endless War (Ex) (Fighter)
sections.description: Alternative 20th level capstone that increases armor training and weapon training bonuses by an additional +2 each.
